message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. It's a fantastic deal, and I believe it's worth every penny.  Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your product is valuable, but I am only able to offer $850,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While it's closer to my asking price, I'm still hoping for a bit more to make this worthwhile. How about $875,000?  I believe this price reflects the value of the product for both of us.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I've reviewed my budget and am willing to go up to $860,000 for your product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
